sentences.en: Could you remind me to get off at Somerset Street?
sentences.cn: 你可否提醒我在森麻实街下车?

sentences.en: Does this bus go by Somerset Street?
sentences.cn: 这辆巴士途经森麻实街 吗 ?

sentences.en: His dying wish was to be laid to rest at the church near his Somerset home.
sentences.cn: 他的遗愿是把他安葬在家乡萨默塞特郡附近的教堂里。

sentences.en: Its Somerset upper - tier brand offers stylish, contemporary living for senior upper management executives.
sentences.cn: 高档次的盛捷品牌的客人则是各行业的中高层专业人士,他们追求的是时尚的, 有品味的公寓.

sentences.en: Like all weak men he laid an exaggerated stress on not changing one's mindW . Somerset Maugham.
sentences.cn: 象所有可怜的人一样,他把过分的压力加诸于不改变想法索默塞特·马海姆.

sentences.en: Maugham Somerset. Maugham's Essays . Trans . Liu Wenrong. Shanghai: The Joint Publishing Company, 2000.
sentences.cn: 毛姆: 《毛姆读书随笔》,刘文荣译. 上海: 三联书店, 2000年.

sentences.en: Miguel Street is considered his earliest short stories, and it won him the Somerset Maugham Prize.
sentences.cn: 《米格尔街》是奈保尔最早创作的短篇小说集, 曾获得萨姆塞特.

sentences.en: The teenagers, seven from London and one from Somerset, were diagnosed in Beijing.
sentences.cn: 在患病的八名少年学生中, 七人来自伦敦,一人来自萨默塞特郡, 都在北京被确诊.

sentences.en: W. Somerset Maugham's novel still packs an emotional punch.
sentences.cn: 威廉·萨默塞特·毛姆的小说仍具有强烈的情感冲击力。

sentences.en: William Somerset : If you kill him, He wins.
sentences.cn: 如果你杀死他, 他就赢了.

sentences.en: William Somerset Maugham has always been attributed to one of the realistic writers.
sentences.cn: 摘要毛姆历来被归类在现实主义的门下.

sentences.en: William Somerset Maugham is an unique writer of modern Britain in the intersection of theand modernity.
sentences.cn: 威廉·萨默塞特·毛姆是一位风格独特的英国现代作家.

trans.tran_cn: <英>（独腿者乘坐的）有衬垫的马鞍
